name: book_reservation
description: Book a reservation for flights with specified passengers and payment methods.

user_id.description: The ID of the user making the reservation (e.g., "sara_doe_496").

origin.description: The origin airport code in three letters (e.g., "JFK").

destination.description: The destination airport code in three letters (e.g., "LAX").

flight_number.description: The unique identifier for the flight (e.g., "HAT001").

flights.description:
A list of flight dictionaries. Each flight dictionary
must contain the following structure:

dob.description: The passenger's date of birth in "YYYY-MM-DD" format (e.g., "1990-01-01").

passengers.description:
A list of passenger dictionaries. Each passenger
dictionary must contain the following structure:

payment_id.description: The ID of the payment method to use (e.g., "credit_card_4421486").

amount.description: The amount to be charged for this payment (e.g., 250.0).

payment_methods.description:
A list of payment method dictionaries. Each
payment dictionary must contain the following structure:

total_baggages.description: The total number of baggage items (non-negative integer, e.g., 2).

nonfree_baggages.description: The number of non-free baggage items (non-negative integer, e.g., 1).

name: calculate
description: Calculate the result of a mathematical expression.

name: get_reservation_details
description: Get the details of a reservation.

name: get_user_details
description: Get the details of a user, including their reservations.

name: list_all_airports
description: List all airports and their corresponding cities based on available flights.

name: search_direct_flight
description: Search direct flights between two cities on a specific date.

origin.description: The origin city airport in three letters, such as 'JFK'.

destination.description: The destination city airport in three letters, such as 'LAX'.

date.description: The date of the flight in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

name: search_onestop_flight
description: Search one-stop flights between two cities on a specific date.

origin.description: The origin city airport in three letters, such as 'JFK'.

destination.description: The destination city airport in three letters, such as 'LAX'.

date.description: The date of the flight in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

name: send_certificate
description: Send a certificate to a user.

user_id.description: The ID of the user to send the certificate to.

name: think
description:
Use the tool to think about something. It will not obtain new information 

or change the database, but just append the thought to the log.

name: transfer_to_human_agents
description: Transfer the user to a human agent, with a summary of the user's issue.

summary.description: A summary of the user's issue.

name: update_reservation_baggages
description: Update the baggage information of a reservation.

total_baggages.description: The new total number of baggage items.

nonfree_baggages.description: The new number of non-free baggage items.

payment_id.description: The ID of the payment method to use.

name: update_reservation_flights
description: Update the flight information of a reservation.

payment_id.description: The ID of the payment method to use.

name: update_reservation_passengers
description: Update the passenger information of a reservation.
